pages.text: Recipes for basic spells available right away. They can be added to any scepter as long as you have the ingredients and experience levels, and the scepter is at the proper Level.$(br2)For more powerful spells find books scattered around the world and [use] them to read the recipe for adding it to a scepter. Found spells will also be available in the $(l:amethyst_imbuement:spell_book)Spell Book$().
